summary: The Fifth Amendment to the Credit Agreement, dated August 5, 2025, modifies the Existing Credit Agreement by redefining the "Consolidated Fixed Charge Coverage Ratio" to exclude certain share repurchases made by Holdings prior to June 30, 2025. The amendment will become effective upon satisfaction of conditions, including receipt of executed counterparts and payment of fees and expenses. The Loan Parties reaffirm their representations and warranties under the Credit Agreement.
